doc:
Louis Daquin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Louis_Daquin 0 Louis-Claude Daquin (or D'Aquino, d'Aquin, d'Acquin; July 4, 1694 – June 15, 1772) was a French composer of Jewish ancestry, writing in the Baroque and Galant styles. He was a virtuoso organist and harpsichordist. Louis-Claude_Daquin ( or_D'Aquino , d'Aquin , d'Acquin ; July_4_,_1694 – June_15_,_1772 ) was a_French_composer of Jewish_ancestry , writing in the_Baroque_and_Galant_styles . He was a_virtuoso_organist_and_harpsichordist .
